author: djames
msg: Upgrade Python bindings to maintain pool pointers in non-struct types,
such as function pointers and batons.
(GenericSWIGWrapper): New class. Generic container for non-struct types,
(apr_pool_t._wrap): New function. Mark a SWIG object as owned by this
(proxy_set_pool): Use pool.wrap to mark proxy object as owned. Mark
proxy parameter as an input and output parameter.

author: djames
msg: (write): Add header_wrappers.py as a dependency for the generated SWIG
header files. Add external_runtime.py as a dependency for the generated
external runtime file. Switch from python to $(PYTHON).
(write_standalone): Generate definition for PYTHON in standalone Makefile
